title: B2B Marketing Storytelling & AI-Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Core B2B marketing principles and practical experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in an offline classroom setting for current practitioners, utilizing AI tools via Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct B2B marketing cases using storytelling techniques and convey core messages with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can interpret B2B customer behavior data and derive strategic insights using AI analytics tools.
Learners can integrate storytelling and AI tools to create an actual B2B marketing campaign proposal and achieve a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
